boardgame.name: Mort Ou Vif
Wyatt Earp
와이어트 어프
boardgame.description: The aim of the game for each player to earn the most money from capturing famous outlaws. 2 to 4 players take up the roles of Sheriffs who are hot on the outlaws tails, trying to capture the outlaws with most rewards on their heads._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;From the Box:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Wild West! Tough times and tough characters! Bandits, desperados, rustlers and thieves are everywhere. Take the rolls of the brave sheriffs riding on the heels of these legendary outlaws. Capture Jesse James! Hunt Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid! Rich rewards await those brave and daring enough. Just don't let them slip away..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;From the Publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In Wyatt Earp, the players are bounty hunters who work cooperatively and competitively to try to capture the most notorious outlaws of the old west. They do this by collecting and playing sets of cards for the various outlaws. When a player plays a set, he both adds to the reward and improves his chances for collecting the reward for that outlaw. At the end of each hand, players collect money for the outlaws that they helped in capturing. After several hands, the player who has collected the most money in rewards is the winner!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;While not officially included, Wyatt Earp is often considered part of the Mystery Rummy series._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This game is #1 in the Alea small box series._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

All our games are brand new in shrink wrap. Buyer pays for shipping. Shipping will depend on your location and the weight of game. We will discount shipping on multiple games orders whenever possible to ensure the fairest rate. We are not responsible for lost mail but will insure shipment, at your request. Items are shipped within one business day of receiving payment. Payment must be received within 7 days after the day you agreed to buy the item, and all PayPal or credit card payments must be made within this time period. If payment isn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t received within these time periods, all orders will be revoked and proper feedback will be left. Unopened merchandise may be returned within 14 days of purchase for a full refund, less original shipping charges. Return shipping charges are the responsibility of the customer with the exception of defective merchandise. To return an item, please contact us prior to sending an item back to us. WA orders pay 8.5% sales tax. Please email us with any questions. Thanks Chum Chum Games customerservice@chumchumgames.com

Rio Grande Games (RIO 176) Number of players: 2-4 Age of players: 12+ Length: 45-60 minutes Game Description: The players are bounty hunters who work cooperatively and competitively to try to capture the most notorious outlaws of the old west. They do this by collecting and playing sets of cards for the various outlaws. When a player plays a set, he both adds to the reward and improves his chances for collecting the reward for that outlaw. At the end of each hand, players collect money for the outlaws that they helped in capturing. After several hands, the player who has collected the most money in rewa rds is the winner! Author: Richard Borg _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Mike Fitzgerald

They do this by collecting and playing sets of cards for the various outlaws. When a player plays a set, he both adds to the reward and improves his chances for collecting the reward for that outlaw.
